projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A scalable e-commerce platform built with Next.js 14, Node.js, and Tailwind CSS.
projects.content:
An advanced e-commerce platform featuring product listings, a shopping cart, and secure checkout functionality.

Project Overview

Built to deliver a seamless online shopping experience with a focus on scalability and performance.

Technical Implementation

The platform leverages:

  • Dynamic Routing for product pages
  • Secure payment integration with Stripe
  • Image Optimization with Next.js
  • Responsive design with Tailwind CSS
challenges: Maintaining responsive layouts for all devices
solutions: Implemented responsive components using Tailwind CSS

projects.title: Blogging Platform
projects.description: A blogging platform with markdown support, user authentication, and real-time previews.
projects.content:
An intuitive platform for bloggers to write, edit, and share posts with ease.

Project Overview

Designed to provide content creators with tools to publish and manage their articles efficiently.

Technical Implementation

Key features include:

  • Markdown editor with live previews
  • User authentication and session management
  • Dynamic theming options
solutions: Developed a theme switcher with Tailwind CSS

projects.title: Real Estate Listings
projects.description: A real estate listing platform with advanced filtering and map integration.
projects.content:
An innovative platform for real estate agencies and buyers to find and showcase properties.

Project Overview

Provides comprehensive property details with an intuitive search and filter system.

Technical Implementation

Highlights include:

  • Map integration with Google Maps API
  • Custom filtering and sorting options
  • Dynamic property pages
challenges: Building advanced search and filter functionality
Ensuring fast loading times for large datasets
solutions: Used React context for managing filter states

projects.title: Fitness Tracking App
projects.description: A fitness tracking application with workout plans and progress tracking.
projects.content:
A feature-rich app for tracking workouts, setting goals, and monitoring progress over time.

Project Overview

Built to help fitness enthusiasts stay motivated and achieve their goals.

Technical Implementation

Main features include:

  • Customizable workout plans
  • Progress tracking and analytics
  • Integration with wearable devices
challenges: Implementing data visualization for progress tracking
solutions: Integrated APIs for wearable device compatibility
Built a flexible workout builder with React

projects.title: Job Portal
projects.description: A job portal for employers and job seekers with resume uploads and AI-powered recommendations.
projects.content:
An intelligent job portal connecting job seekers with employers effectively.

Project Overview

Designed to simplify the hiring process and provide tailored job recommendations to users.

Technical Implementation

Core features include:

  • Resume parsing with AI
  • Advanced job search and filtering
  • Employer dashboard for managing job postings
challenges: Handling a large number of concurrent users
Ensuring secure data handling for resumes
solutions: Used Python and TensorFlow for AI functionality
Secured data with encryption and role-based access control
